tool.name: Gender Check- Y ploidy
tool.description: Checks the gender of a sample based on the ploidy of the y chromosome from DetermineGermlineContigPloidy
tool.command: grep "^Y" $input > $output && GENDER_NUM=\$(grep "^Y\t1" $input | wc -l) && echo \$GENDER_NUM && echo $gender && if [ \$GENDER_NUM -eq $gender ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
